attributes.action: The Government must not allow Huawei involvement the UK 5G network.
attributes.additional_details: This is a major risk to national security, exposes the UK to Chinese eavesdropping and intelligence gathering and puts at serious risk our membership of the '5-eyes' intelligence agreement.  All members of this agreement have stated Chinese involvement in state communications is a risk to their national security, and the USA has stated it may have to re-visit their intelligence sharing agreements with the UK as a result.  These agreements help keep us safe with the continuous flow in intelligence and flow of information with our allies.
attributes.background: Cancel the agreement to allow Hauwei involvement in the building of the UK 5G network infrastructure and software.
